snippet.title: Amber Heard PAID Friends To LIE In Court!
snippet.description:
Amber Heard PAID Friends To LIE In Court!
Did Amber Heard pay her relatives to lie about the actor?
This video sheds more light on the doubt, watch till the end.
Let it be said, Johnny Depp is determined to wash his reputation. After losing his lawsuit against the daily The Sun, who had called him an abusive husband towards Amber Heard, the actor requested an appeal trial. The star of Pirates of the Caribbean therefore hopes to win his case after years of fierce struggle. 

A case that could ultimately tip in his favor. For good reason, his lawyers suspect his ex-wife of having paid his friend the activist iO Tillett Wright in order to produce a damning false testimony against him. 

Here on Film Streak we are all about the latest spill in Hollywood! You can rest assure that we will bring you all the latest celebrity drama and gossip especially concerning you favorite actors! We´ll also make sure to keep you updated on the newest movie updates and releases – so if you are interested in anything that happens in Hollywood, you should make sure to stay tuned!  

And there you have it guys! We hope you enjoyed the video! If you did please consider leaving a like and telling us what you though in the comments! 

Here are some links to some of our other videos that you might find interesting as well:

Emilia Clarke REACTION Before Replacing Amber Heard in Aquaman 2! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYXp9wXHUWw
Johnny Depp OFFICIALLY REHIRED | Back In a New Pirates of the Caribbean 6 Movie? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=utozMdfngVk

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wOo2BFTRrL4

So, if you are interested in anything related to Hollywood, make sure to smash that subscribe button to see more of our content in the future! 🎬 https://bit.ly/3kzplQd
